/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a red roof, its vibrant color contrasting beautifully with the surrounding greenery. On the left side of the street, a white building with a blue roof stands, adding to the colorful palette of the scene.

In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. Despite the presence of man-made structures, the image exudes a sense of tranquility and harmony between nature and architecture. It's a snapshot of everyday life in Beijing, captured in a single, beautiful frame.
